title: Kim Jong Un visited a brand new spa resort in North Korea and posed for photographs on the edge of a hot tub
text:
Kim said Yangdok is "perfect match for the geographic characteristics and natural environment of the area," KCNA reported.

North Korean leader Kim Jong Un visits the Yangdok County Hot Spring Resort, North Korea, in this undated picture released by North Korea's Central News Agency (KCNA) on October 23, 2019. Reuters

Kim also used his visit to slam South Korean facilities at resort on Mount Kumgang as "backward" and "hotchpotch," saying they should tear it down, Reuters reported.

Kim said North Korea's new spa contrasts starkly with that of South Korea's "architecture of capitalist businesses targeting profit-making from roughly built buildings."
description: Kim's found his visit to Yangdok Country Hot Spring Resort "refreshing and reviving," Korea Central News Agency (KCNA) reported on Friday.
